sentence.Network_en: Woodland, roadside and dooryard will soon be jeweled beyond a rajah's richest dreams.
sentence.Network_cn: 树林, 路边和院内不久就会装扮得珠光宝气,胜过古代东方帝王最富庶的梦想.

sentence.Network_en: The harvests beat out upon the threshing floor which was also the dooryard to the house.
sentence.Network_cn: 收割完了,再在打谷场上脱粒.王龙家的打谷场,就是自家门前的空场.

sentence.Network_en: You look, is what the sod here compares dooryard fatter, tenderer gnawed in this!
sentence.Network_cn: 你看, 这里的草皮是不是比前院的更肥 、 更嫩?
